home.title: Management System
home.description: This system allows you to effectively and efficiently manage and track your tasks, as well as other functionalities.

information.express: Express was used as the backend framework to create and manage routes using a RESTful API.
information.angular: Angular was employed to develop the user interface, with reusable components and a router for smooth navigation.
information.mongodb: MongoDB as a NoSQL database to store the data of tasks and users.

angular.title: Angular
angular.description: In this task management project, Angular was chosen for its advantages in developing complex applications and because it offers a wide range of tools and functionalities that enable better data management and a more user-friendly interface along with NG-ZORRO.

structure.title: Project Structure
structure.description: In the tree view, you can find the frontend application files. On the other hand, the 'window' displays the code corresponding to the selected file in the tree view, allowing for easy visualization and understanding of its structure and functionality.

Internationalization.title: Internationalization
Internationalization.description: Manage language localization and translations in your application.

library.title: Used Libraries
library.description: The library section lists the libraries or frameworks utilized in the frontend application. These libraries provide additional functionalities, utilities, or tools that enhance the development process and enable efficient code implementation.

auth0.name: auth0/angular-jwt
auth0.description: Angular wrapper around the JWT-decoding utility at https://github.com/auth0/angular2-jwt.

fontawesome.name: fortawesome/fontawesome-free
fontawesome.description: A library of free icons for use with the FontAwesome icon set.

ngrx/effects.name: ngrx/effects
ngrx/effects.description: A library for managing side effects and asynchronous actions in NgRx.

ngrx/router-store.name: ngrx/router-store
ngrx/router-store.description: A library for integrating Angular Router with NgRx.

ngrx/store-devtools.name: ngrx/store-devtools
ngrx/store-devtools.description: A set of dev tools for debugging and inspecting the NgRx store.

ngrx/store.name: ngrx/store
ngrx/store.description: A state management library for Angular applications based on Redux.

ngx-translate/core.name: ngx-translate/core
ngx-translate/core.description: A library for implementing internationalization (i18n) in Angular applications.

ngx-translate/http-loader.name: ngx-translate/http-loader
ngx-translate/http-loader.description: An Http loader for ngx-translate to load translations from a server.

bootstrap.name: Bootstrap
bootstrap.description: A popular CSS framework for building responsive, mobile-first web pages.

bootstrap-icons.name: Bootstrap Icons
bootstrap-icons.description: A set of free, open-source icons designed to work with Bootstrap.

ng-zorro.name: ng-zorro-antd
ng-zorro.description: A library of UI components for Angular based on Ant Design

changeLanguage.title: Idioma Cambiado
changeLanguage.description: El idioma se ha cambiado exitosamente
